patterns: Thank you for all of your help
responses: I'll be here if you need anymore help

patterns: What are your hours of operation?
How much longer are you open for?
responses: We are open daily from 5 am to 12 am
Our doors are open from 9 am to 5 pm daily

patterns: Can I ask you a question?
What are things I can ask you?
responses: I can tell you about equipment, classes, vending, COVID policies, and membership
We have a number of squat racks, benches, dumbbells, and machines.

patterns: Can I take a zumba class?
Can I take a yoga class?
I don't know how to lift weights
Can someone teach me how to lift weights?
responses: We offer group classes that are included with your membership. Personal trainers are available for an additional charge.

patterns: Is there water in the gym?
Can I get a water at the gym?
responses: Water is available to all members for free. We do sell other beverages for additional fees.

patterns: How are members kept safe during covid?
How are members kept safe during coronavirus?
Do I need to wear a mask?
What is your response to coronavirus?
What is your response to covid?
Will I need to wear a mask?
Will I need to wear a mask because of coronavirus?
Will I need to wear a mask because of covid?
Are masks required because of covid?
Are masks required because of coronavirus?
Will masks be required because of covid?
Will masks be required because of coronavirus?
responses: All members are required to wear masks in the gym. Additionally members must wipe down equipment after use.

patterns: How many members belong to the gym?
Are there many members in the gym?
How many members do you have?
Are there many people with the gym?
What is the total number of members?
responses: The gym currently has around 200 members.

patterns: How can I become a member?
How do I join the gym?
responses: The easiest way to join the gym is by going to our website www.gym.com
